Posts.Content: May 2, 2009 05:42PM sorchaj wrote: marmsie - I have a similar situation. 11 years ago I had a right lumpectomy with axillary dissection, chemo and rads, now facing a mastectomy with sentinel node biopsy on the sames side. I don't have a date yet, but I will be thinking good thoughts for you on your surgery date!
Posts.Title: May 2009 surgery lovinmomma dkhancock1948

Posts.Content: Apr 21, 2009 09:28PM sorchaj wrote: Hi pokadot-  I'm glad to hear you did reasonably well through your surgery. I have a clotting problem too, and with surgery coming up, my PS has reccommended that I see a hematologist. When I did chemo 11 years ago I had 4 pulmonary embolisms. I've been on  prophylactic blood thinners throughout my chemo this time, so I'm keeping my fingers crossed.
Posts.Title: Bilateral Mastectomy April 9...blood clot issues... pokadot sorchaj
